name: Manthan The Achievement
briefDescription: Manthan The Achievement, located in Bally, Howrah is working in the field of Mass Awareness Campaign through THEATRE (Street & Proscenium) at all over India, on different health & social issues like education, environment human rights etc. by its expertise skill. “Disha Community Development Programme” for the destitute children from the rag picker’s & refugee colonies of Dumdum, Bally is the another project of this organization under which, free training on home based education, basic computer knowledge, dance & recitation, acting etc. and other livelihood programme is being organized.Under the Rural Development Programme, this organization is running a health clinic “Arogyo Niketan” at the remote village of Naoda, Shyampur-II block of Howrah district. Through this programme, this organization is providing health check-up facilities with a very nominal cost, including free health Check-up camps.To run all this activities, we need a lump sum funding source  so that all programme can be successful.
